tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Geospatial_Geothermal_Data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location GEOMETRY(POINT),
    temperature FLOAT,
    mineral_content TEXT,
    exploration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE GeothermalData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    well_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    depth INT,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name TEXT,
    site_location TEXT,
    geospatial_id INT,
    geothermal_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE GeospatialData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    geo_type VARCHAR(50),
    geo_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GeothermalExplorationData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    well_id INT,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    depth DECIMAL,
    geological_feature VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE SpatialAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_id INT,
    geospatial_data_id INT,
    geothermal_data_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SiteSelection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    suitability_score DECIMAL,
    selected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Metadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)
